not one thread loose (idiom); strictly according to the rules/meticulous/not one hair out of place
to struggle on whilst at death's door (idiom)
to drift and live without purpose (idiom); to drag out an ignoble existence

sentences.english: But later, people miswrote the name.
sentences.chinese: 后来人们误把苟杳这个名字。

sentences.english: If the result unexpectedly is share-win GongGe high school.
sentences.chinese: 结果竟然是苟宫格高中解元。

sentences.english: Gou Yao received him very warmly.
sentences.chinese: 苟杳非常热情地招待了他。

sentences.english: If the stone and others after being pursued.
sentences.chinese: 苟金石等人在后死命追赶。

sentences.english: If jump when the chicken foot ankle injury, stone has been carrying her forward.
sentences.chinese: 跳伞时凤小脚的脚腕受伤，苟金石一直背着她前进。

sentences.english: Housewife Gou Jixiang encounters misfortune, the husband dies, oneself cover loss.
sentences.chinese: 家庭主妇苟吉祥遭遇不幸，丈夫离世，自己蒙冤。

sentences.english: I always gotta like the crazy bitches.
sentences.chinese: 我一定是喜欢女孩像疯苟。

sentences.english: It is boring to eat, to sleep is fulfilling.
sentences.chinese: 吃饭令人烦，睡觉苟残喘。
